the best way to describe dead by daylight is if you gave a high school sophomore executive access to a trust fund of one billion dollars. would this game theoretically be better with a different, more engaged and... better dev team? Yes. is it an idea that is executed competently enough to be consistently enjoyable? Yes. this game is also very grindy and is desgined so that even if you have 1000+ hours, you may not have every perk unlocked. whether this makes the leveling system a grindy bore or a slow drip of progress to keep players engaged is up to you.
killer go smack survivor go weeee
un desastre desde la ultima actualizacion, aparte no tiene nada importante.

Do you feel like running around an apocalyptic wasteland, filled with generators that need to be touched, while attempting to sandbag almost any horror themed maniac? Then this is the game for you. Side effects may included: heightened sense of fear, unusual desire to punch monitor, complete loss in humanity, eventual selfish desire to escape alone.

"doing gens, you?"

The game barely functions, and the community is toxic as all holy hell. They're more concerned about bleeding you for all your cash then making sure they have a balanced game. The killers are so unbalanced that it's not uncommon to see a game end with no generators finished. The hag is the worst in my opinion. She has so many runes to place. It's nearly impossible to avoid running into them, and when you do it whips your camera around and makes it nearly impossible to figure out whats going on. 

And then there's the bugs. I've played Bethesda games with more functional gameplay than this. Killers picking you up from over walls, rubber banding, taking hits from ten feet away, etc, etc. It's hard to enjoy a game when everything works against you. God forbid you play as a survivor, because the killers are so over powered that the survivors rarely have a chance unless their in the top ranked players. But that doesn't matter to the devs, cause they just keep on buffing the killers and making it harder for the survivors. 

The only fun you'll get from this game is playing in a private lobby with 4 other friends. Don't have that? Don't bother picking it up. It's not worth the money.
I'm still waiting for Lady Dimitrescu as killer.
Muito bom pra jogar com amigos

A fun game when you don't take it seriously and basically the hall of fame for Horror and "Horror".

 Community is generally alright, with a few rotten apples.  

The game is for both people with friends and basement dwellers such as myself. Killer is fun as you take out the anger you've built up all week on some poor baby Dwight. Survivor is fun when you're with friends. You can also go in solo and be frightened by the Myers that's been dry humping you for 3 minutes without you noticing.

7/10 I'm an entitled Survivor/Killer main.

the most one sided game in existence. you can be a towering demon with the powers of the devil himself and you will get sent in to oblivion, tortured for all eternity in the darkest pits of hell by a skinny ginger b*tch, a twitchy nerd, a florist and a f***ing 89 year old.
no matter how powerful you think you are.. they will pulverize youre legs to dust, they will burn your eyes out with nothing but light, they will lure you into a false sense of security and trap you in a living nightmare. forever chasing the dragon but NEVER actually catching it.....
if you want to get good you can put alot of time into the game and actually kill the survivors but you are not going to enjoy it.

O jogo é legal, divertido pra se jogar com amigos, porém tem uma equipe técnica péssima o que torna o jogo EXTREMAMENTE bugado.

Dentre os bugs que mais me ocorreram estão os seguintes:

- 2 ou 3 pessoas dão disconnect da partida, e logo depois o restante é kikado da partida também

- Quando estou em pt com mais de 1 amigo, ao achar partida, o meu amigo é kikado da pt e eu entro no lobby jogo sozinho, então é preciso recomeçar a procura diversas vezes, até dar certo. (Isso é MUITO frequente)

- Não conseguir curar nem ser curado quando jogando com o Bill. (isso aconteceu com meu irmão diversas vezes durante várias partidas, o que o fez pedir reembolso do game)
Great game to play with friends. Now cross play even better to play with Xbox, Playstation and PC
